guys if u wnt to update ur ripeed version to 1.01 update then simply open notepad file and copy paste and save it as .reg file...
here is it

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\{BE4BA698-8533-4F77-9559-C7F3F78C0B05}]
"DisplayVersion"="1.00"
